name: Citizen (Gaia Fiorenza)
description:
Choice game created for the empire-themed Scream Jam fo August 2019. Unfortunately, due to real life happening, as it usually does, this story is still unfinished. You may consider this a first short chapter and, once the jam is over, I'll upload the completed story. I promise the gore tag will make sense then.

I hope you enjoy the little stump nonetheless!
